body:
Hello, it's me again.

When trying `spack install fontconfig`, I have this error:

`configure: error: Package requirements (freetype2) were not met:`
`Package 'bzip2', required by 'freetype2', not found`

I've tried to add `depends_on('bzip2')` in `var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fontconfig/package.py` but it still fails.

Any issue?
title: Add missing bzip2 dependency to fontconfig
